channel.title: Can anyone help me add chaos altar?
channel.description:
I want to add two chaos altars on my server (I don't got) my server is RicScape v2 and when you pray at chaos altar 12000 exp each time you pray I will put in a picture below of what and where I wanted chaos altars,bu when I add them to objecthandler abd client.java save, compile and close folder I open back up and log in on my server nothere there appears!!I don't get it and on my picure these are not chaos altars eveyone can see and use if you look at pic you can see I outline the "contruction" and the "chaos altar (lvl 210)"
[IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/chaosaltar-1.jpg[/img]
what do I do to have the altars appear and have them for use for everyone and give 12000 exp everytime a person prays??? :confused:

item.title: Can anyone help me add chaos altar?
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

Can you be any more specific?

Read full topic
item.source: Can anyone help me add chaos altar?

item.title: Can anyone help me add chaos altar?
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

Find a source with the 12000 exp chaos alter, Get the ID code of the chaos alter , look through every folder or an easier way Hold CTRL + F and paste the ID code in there, Copy that section of the source , Paste it into your source where u want it and finished. I think. lol

Read full topic
item.source: Can anyone help me add chaos altar?
